website_summaries.verdict: Best option for those doing physical therapy at home.
pros: 5 band set helps tone and stretch leg muscles
Each band has a different resistance level
Many reviewers use these bands as part of their physical therapy program
But others say they provide a great workout for those without limitations as well
cons: These work best on bare skin
If used over workout clothes or socks, they may roll up

customer_reviews.title: Great for use in my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for use in my classroom. I have them on the front legs of my desks so my students having something to bounce on. They are great for my ADD/ADHD kiddos, and my other kids love them too! I often sit at a desk and bounce my feet as well, it is remarkably relaxing. The bands have already helped my kids to stay more focused, and there is very little tension in the room (I teach high schoolers). Thank you for having a product that can be used for more than just a workout.
customer_reviews.author: S. DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The bands increase in thickness but are all the same diameter rendering the difference in resistance incredibly minute. If you don't have massive legs, you'll have trouble keeping them around you. If you aren't an absolute beginner - and possibly even then - the hardest band will not even be difficult enough. I am not a fit person, I started working out for the first time ever lightly about a month before purchasing these and think they are garbage. Don't make my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: AlexandraTheWorst

customer_reviews.title: ... green bands are very light so they can roll easily making certain workouts really frustrating but thats just what ...
customer_reviews.text: The yellow and green bands are very light so they can roll easily making certain workouts really frustrating but thats just what you have to expect when working with bands. I really like the extra resistance that these provide. I got them to use during Beachbody's 80 Day Obsession rather than purchasing bands through Beachbody. I think I got a much wider variety and extra resistance in these 5 bands versus the 3 that Beach Body sells.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Been using these bands for several months now and they've held up nicely. I like having multiple resistance levels for different activities, although I mostly use these for training my knees out in squats and for side-steps. The light band also works for some shoulder activation like wall slides.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Super nice I'm still recovering from a major ankle injury (screws, plates, etc.). These bands especially helpful
customer_reviews.author: allonespeed

customer_reviews.title: Lower price, Still high quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use with a new video workout program that just came out. These are much more affordable than buying from that program’s website but still very high quality. I love how small they are when you fold them up into the little bag that comes with them. Perfect for sticking in a suitcase traveling or storing at home in a drawer. Great workout tool! Even the light and medium ones give you a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: These are strong and durable.I love all the options and the price is great. They fit well and don't roll either. Excellent value for the money and the company's follow up and customer service is excellent. I'll buy more products from Limm.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J

customer_reviews.title: Not very resistant
customer_reviews.text: I immediately started with the black band, which was not challenging enough. I've been using a black band at the gym to target my hip stabilizers, and this seemed to have half the resistance. I'm fit, but I'm trying to strengthen weak muscles here...so the strongest band should not be easy. These seem better for stretching than for strengthening. Will probably pay up for a stronger band, or buy in store so I can test it out. Update: Limm reached out and they have been great - they genuinely care about their products and the reputation of their company, and have gone above and beyond in their communication.
customer_reviews.author: Haley S

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase and already received an e-mail from ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy these, not those. This is an American-made product and includes 5 resistance bands of varied thickness, a mesh bag, and an instruction booklet. Links to videos are available too. I am very pleased with my purchase and already received an e-mail from the company owner. The bands can be used in numerous ways to increase muscle strength and endurance, as well as cardiovascular health. I bring the bag to work and used the bands during my workday.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit Lady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have owned many different types of resistance bands. Many repeatedly bunch up or roll while working out. I have used these daily, for 30 - 60 minutes each time, for the past week. They may have bunched up maybe once or twice in that time which is not a lot when compared to other brands. They were easy to flatten, went on smoothly, and provided the resistance I needed. I would recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: good variety and durability
customer_reviews.text: High quality, good variety and durability. My only complaint is how easily they roll up during use. I get that manufacturing something that can stay flat against sweaty legs while those legs are moving in two different directions means creating something that defies the laws of physics, but clearly all resistance bands have the same objective... These are great if you plan to always wear pants!
customer_reviews.author: TheAudestCooper

customer_reviews.title: I love these loops
customer_reviews.text: I love these loops. I have used them over 2 months and they are amazing. I am able to challenge myself and feel great change in my body from using these loops. I have bought other loops and after a week of using them they would become sticky and i would have to use baby powder to keep them useable but these no need for that. I have read the negative reviews and was hesitant about getting these but I absolutely do not regret getting these. I ordered a second set for my husband. Very pleased with these and the price for what you get is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed. Only way i use them and actually feel ...
customer_reviews.text: Really light all of them. I would say theyre for beginners, but theyre not considering i am a beginner and they still toooo easy/light. Even my 8 year old can use the light ones with no trouble. Really disappointed. Only way i use them and actually feel something is if i use the red over the black at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bands! Perfect for 80 day obsession
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bands! They seem very high quality and the price you really cant beat it. Way cheaper than getting the beachbody set. I tried some 9 inch bands and they rolled up way too much. These 12 in bands are just what this curvy girl needed to get back on track, and once I lose a little weight and need smaller ones I will probably look at getting the 9 inch
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The product comes with a guide on particular exercises you can do with the bands. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Minimal rolling
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a work out program that requires the resistance loops. I had a set, but my workouts we're taking twice as long because I had to constantly stop and adjust the loop after rolling. I decided to try this set, and I'm glad I did! They are a thicker, smoother material. There are certain exercises that they will roll, but nothing like my other set. You really can't beat the quality for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gray

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Perfect quality, size, and durability.
customer_reviews.text: These bands are just as expected when I received them in the mail, in fact I started using them the same day I got them! I was a little unsure which brand to order in the beginning because I wasn't sure of the durability and how much stretch there would be in each band, but I am so happy I ended up with these ones because the different sizes makes it possible for all types of workouts- both arm and leg exercises. Definitely a good buy on my end :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Sauleda

customer_reviews.title: Break Easily and Roll/Twist
customer_reviews.text: Not only do they roll and not stay in place, half of them broke on the very first movement. These are possibly the worst bands I've ever used. I'll go back to the expensive ones, because you apparently get what you pay for. Don't even waste your money or time with these.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! They didn’t last long at all. Three of the bands melted like old rubberbands tend to do after use. I haven’t used the yellow resistance band so it was still in the packaging but you can see that it’s starting to change color and will pop if I attempt to use it. I would leave the red and blue bands in my gym bag in my car so I threw them out right away but I left the others in the house and noticed the same thing happened. (Shown in the picture are the two bands the green that I used at home and the yellow, just removed out the pack to show the discoloration.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two days
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to serve as an accompaniment to a stationary bicycle so that I'd have something to do with my arms while pedaling. After a few days of use a band snapped. So I looked at the reviews and apparently this was a rare, 1 in a million event, so I returned that set and Amazon sent a replacement. This time it took two days for a band to break. Looking at the images of how they're supposed to be used, I wasn't doing anything out of the ordinary. Perhaps this is one of those exercise gadgets that people get and are never meant to actually use.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These bands are so thin and flimsy that they curl up and provide no resistance a few reps into an exercise. I’m throwing them away and buying higher quality bands.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Long

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: These bands are such a disappointment, but I gusess I got what I payed for. Absolute crap. Unless you have stringy chicken legs, don’t even bother wasting your time or money. Not even the thickest band would stay put and would just roll. Forget squatting with these properly to full depth. You can get away with it if you do 1/4 squats which is how I figure these got any good reviews. Probably by idiots who also workout in commercial gyms. I’ve turned these into stretching loops instead. I wish I could get my money back. I’ve learned lesson for being frugal with equipment. I just wanted these for my warmups and mobility. Cheap things.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha De La Torre

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Green band broke after only a couple uses. I assume the others will soon follow.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Braughton

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to start resistance training and purchased this product for its durability. However, two of the bands broke soon after I started using them. Additionally, the bands are extremely thin.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Z

customer_reviews.title: Resistance is very low feels more like 10lbs than the 35-40lbs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Look elsewhere if you are a stronger guy that can curl heavy weights. I used 6 bands in one hand doing curls with ease so it's hard to believe the resistance is 35-40lbs. These bands would be okay if you do high rep. In fact, I even combined 3 bands in one hand and did one arm bicep curls with ease for over 20 reps. Limm makes a heavier resistance bands but they never are in stock. For the most part I'm back to actual free weights. You people can play with your bands I'm going back to iron. Nothing beats real weight.
customer_reviews.author: Don L

customer_reviews.title: The material of the bands is nice, the carrying case is convenient
customer_reviews.text: The material of the bands is nice, the carrying case is convenient, and so far after a few workouts it seems like the bands hold up well to a variety of exercises. The companies customer service making sure I received and was satisfied with my purchase was also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging. I liked the mesh bag. The bands are significantly lighter than I expected. The extra light and light bands might be good for shoulder/knee rehab, but for general exercise, they offer very little resistance. This means that the next sizes up; medium, heavy, and extra heavy; won't give you a heavier resistance without doubling up. So, I primarily used the heavy and extra heavy. Use was around once a week over the past 10 months. The extra heavy snapped today! It wasn't stretched beyond design but as with any rubber band, I guess the material just degraded over the past few months. I am disappointed since I was very careful in taking care of these.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Simon

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the Tone It Up "booty bands" but I popped one so I decided to get a whole new set. I liked how these included a variety of resistance. However they are slick so they don't stay in place easily and they were too big for me. I like smaller ones since I'm a petite woman I want to have a strong resistance during more range of motion. I have taken a picture to compare these ones to the ones I already had at home. I did return these and just buy a new set of what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of resistance bands. It comes with a carrying case to keep everything together and takes up very little room in your gym bag. I like that there is a good variety of resistance strengths so that you can work up to heavy resistance. I like that it is really compact and would travel easy for vacations or business travel.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Big Rubber Bands
customer_reviews.text: I have used the bands since receiving them under supervision/in-person sessions with Physical Therapist, increasing resistance to the X-heavy band for the past 4 weeks. Two days ago, it snapped apart. I'm a 69 year-old, 145 lb woman using them for strengthening my knees. I returned to using the heavy resistance band (which I'd used perhaps 2 weeks) and it broke like a rubber band this morning. Lighter resistance bands are not useful for me.
customer_reviews.author: DOColt

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first, but if you use them frequently like I do, they become VERY stretched out quickly. The black band which is supposed to be "extra heavy" is already stretched to the point where it looks gray now and is the same size/resistance as the band 2 levels above it. They also roll if you're not too careful, which becomes uncomfortable so you have to stop to unroll it...really inconvenient if you're trying to get a workout in! I think these would be okay for a beginner, but not for someone who is using them frequently or for harder workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: NO Bonus eBook, Instruction Manual, Online Videos comes with this bands. Only 5 Bands and carrying bag comes with it.
customer_reviews.text: The product description clearly shows that "Bonus eBook, Instruction Manual, Online Videos" included. However, I don't find any instruction about ebook or instruction manual or online videos.
customer_reviews.author: Nand

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic, and I never had any issues. I liked the different strengths, and the pink colors were fun! The travel bag they come in is super handy and nice too. I accidentally lost these at my gym and replaced them with a cheap-o set from TJMaxx and I absolutely hate my replacement ones because they snapped in my face and were generally cruddy. This set never snapped, never got gross, and was fantastic! Get these - don't get cruddy ones from TJMaxx... I'm probably going to re-order this set because they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: superb resistance band for many purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my total gym fit. instead of using actual weight plates (which are heavy and bit dangerous to use), I am giving the total gym extra resistance and weight with this resistance bands. it works quite well even though the resistance is not quite the same feeling as the actual weight plates, but it is good enough and serve the purpose very well. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Y. YoonTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering odor
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, these bands are great. I like the variety of resistances and carrying pouch. I might buy a longer length next time. However, they are definitely not odor free. The smell is overpowering and burns my throat. It smells more like plasticizer than natural rubber. Worse, the smell transfers to your skin with the slightest touch and is almost impossible to get rid of. I've had them for a week or two now and the smell hasn't gotten any better.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Powell

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: i haven't worked in many years do to disability. i used to be quite fit but have become flabby and less healthy over the years. i have had these for close to a month now and am feeling better than i have in some time. they've allowed me to tone my muscles and increase my strength in the shore time i have been using them. while i will never be back to the levels i was at in my 30s and 40s, i do see myself being considerably more fit in time and therefore more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: nonyo

customer_reviews.title: Love the minimalistic design of the bands
customer_reviews.text: Love the minimalistic design of the bands. I really like that the resistant levels are written into the bands, along with a small picture for those who are visual. Not to mention I received an email from "limm group" ensuring that my delivery went all. That's something to take notice of! That's if anyone bothered to read the email. I like the products and hope you like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Shop

customer_reviews.title: Good while they last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these nine months ago and use them for around 20 minutes a day. The heavy band already has a tear in it, and the extra heavy band broke completely with a very loud snap while it was in use. They work well while they last but they're not as durable as the description claims. Also, I wish you could get multiple bands of the same or similar strength instead of such an array of different strengths. I never had a use for the lighter bands so those were kind of a waste.
customer_reviews.author: dru9875

customer_reviews.title: So far I like these bands
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these bands, I have only tried the blue, red, and the black. They are somewhat "lighter" or have less resistance than I had originally expected. I am not very fit, 4'11" , and didn't think I would have to jump straight to the x-heavy. But, I just double them up when I do certain things, like squats. If you are a pro I would look into heavier duty ones. I have a little bit of issue with rolling, but it depends on the type of pants/fabric I wear. If it's on my bare skin I have no issues. I think they are great for starting off.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Width too small.
customer_reviews.text: Thought these would be goood for squats, pelvic crunches and more. They roll up and start to pinch your skin since it’s their width is so small. Good for arm stretches but not useful for yoga, or leg workouts since they’re constantly rolling up. I used the green level for my yoga routine and it kept messing me up and felt like it would snap at any moment. I even tried other workouts but like I said, it kept rolling and twisting and not working well.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Worth your while if you need resistance or help
customer_reviews.text: A while back I fell at work and broke my wrist and severely sprained my ankle. Workman’s comp was a joke and paid for next to nothing - I had to do my own physical therapy. These straps helped me gain better motion without impact. The elasticity has held up amazingly and the entire family has used them without the bands ‘giving out’. If you need to do your own PT, or want some resistance when your stretching - I would recommend these bands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made and work great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on an impulse! LOL! So glad I did they work great, are made very well! Definitely recommend them if your looking to enhance your workouts! They come in a little bag that’s easy to carry anywhere! They are wider than other bands I looked at, I’m so glad I went with the wider ones! They are thin enough to double them up if you need more resistance! Highly recommended these, great price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Becca8683

customer_reviews.title: IM GLAD I BOUGHT IT! IF YOU DO, YOU WONT REGRET IT.
customer_reviews.text: This band's are incredible, is a good home equipment to have or even to take to the gym. Is so small you can take it any where... i mostly use it for strech out, leg and glute workouts. Let me tell you... it's worth it to buy it and I'm so glad I did. I been looking for one and I found this one has really good reviews and I'm glad I'm not disappointed because I use it all the time. AND THE BEST THING BOUT IT! They shipped it really fast and it came a day early for me !!! I was so happy eager to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: I get to work out while being LAZY? YES PLEASE.
customer_reviews.text: I use these while I'm sitting on the couch. I can be on my laptop, watching tv, or reading a book, all while busting my glutes. I usually use the highest strength ones (red and black). I pull it up just over my knees and sit there either doing reps with the resistance, or just pulling my knees apart to a certain resistance point and keeping them there as long as I can. It will make you sore! I love them
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Length is TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: These resistance bands are way too big! You can’t even feel the resistance because the band was made too wide. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TimD

customer_reviews.title: Workout anywhere and anytime
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this resistance bands for a while now and I'm loving it! Everyday I discover a new exercise I can do with them. I can have a full workout for the whole body with this bands and I don't even have to get out of the house. They're also perfect for travelling, because they're so little and light, they don't take so much space in your luggage. This is the best solution for those who want to take their workout with them wherever they go.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Pisani

customer_reviews.title: Top exercise bands
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!! They are of great quality and come in a little mesh bag to store them in. I bought them since my exercise bands did not seem to be strong enough for exercises I wanted to use them for. I had to double bands and was more occupied adjusting bands than actually focusing on my workout. Not with these! These bands are great!!! They are strong and a great addition to my home workouts. I am so happy to have replaced my other exercise bands!! Definitely recommend buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Satty83

customer_reviews.title: Great for physical therapy had such an improvement with using ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for physical therapy had such an improvement with using these over the last month! Such a great tool to have and easier to use than the bands they give you in PT... especially since they are small and easily transportable with no powder dust etc. Thanks Limm for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: H. Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: While the latex quality of these bands is fine, they provide very light resistance at least as compared to gym grade bands I've used. I’m also not sure why they bothered to color code or rate the bands since the difference between them is minimal and the “most resistant” black band is stretchier than the red one. These will work fine for exercises which require lots of stretch and very little resistance, or if you want to use them in place of, say, bungee cords. Look elsewhere if you need bands that will give you any sort of work out.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Eyed

customer_reviews.title: The bands work well but more importantly the company stands by their warranty
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these bands a few times a month for 8 months and they work well. They do not slip down as easily as some bands but they are not resistant to slipping down. I had a band snap while using it which was unfortunate and seemed like it should have lasted longer. I contacted the company and they sent me a replacement band. So they stand by their warranty/satisfaction guarantee which is why I gave them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lorunner

customer_reviews.title: Lost elasticity
customer_reviews.text: The blue one is about the same as the yellow one now.. this is only like 6 months after I purchased it. The black and red ones are okay, but the yellow green and blue ones are basically useless:/
customer_reviews.author: feeebz

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in place while working out
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these on and off for a few years. All of them have broke except for the strongest one. They are very very thin and easily roll up my thighs or shins whenever I’m doing squats, bridges, side-steps, etc. If you are a beginner with resistance bands these would probably be great because you have a wide range of resistance to choose from. If you are doing a full on workout and getting all sweaty and moving a lot with them, I recommend something much more durable - thicker and maybe a cloth-like material instead of all rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hulet

customer_reviews.title: I love these bands
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, packaged wonderfully and they come in 5 difference resistance levels. I'm 6'1" so sometimes resistance bands can easily snap with my long stride, but so far I've had no problem with any of them snapping and they've helped me take my leg and glute workouts to the next level. They come in a nifty mesh bag which makes them very easy to keep organized in your gym bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Caitybelle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price, perfect for doing shoulder work and hip work, and hitting the little muscles when I'm not in the gym. I have no complaints. I'm probably in pretty good shape and use only the 1st 3 bands shoulder (rotator cuff, external rotation type stuff) and hip work (monster walks, side walks). The two strongest bands are a bit strong for me at this time for those smaller muscle groups. Good to keep in the desk at work or use at home or while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!  Good quality bands with mesh bag & instructional pdf
customer_reviews.text: This company puts a lot into pleasing their customers. Bands arrived quickly, they're very nice quality, and they come with a handy drawstring mesh bag for storage. After the bands arrived, they e-mailed a pdf with lots of exercises, as well as charts you can fill in to keep track of your routine. I really like the loops as opposed to the bands that you tie, because they go flat against your leg and don't bunch up, which can make you sore pretty quickly. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: My first time owning exercise bands. I didn’t want to buy anything elsbotate for now. These were reasonably priced as a set. I like that they are color-coded,so you’ll know how to work your way up. Included is a pamphlet showing basic usages with the band. I tried the first one and boy, did my triceps feel it after two reps of fifteen. I can tell I will enjoy this change from using dumbbells for my arms. There is also a nice bag included to store these bands and instructions on how to clean them. Happy with my purchase, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Djuli

customer_reviews.title: Great lazy mans exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: Rather than haul mess with changing weights on a bar, these loops are awesome. I use it (extra heavy) while watching tv. Do several sets and it exercises/exhausts the muscle being addressed. When I am finished, rather than putting away weights I hang the flexband on the handrest of my treadmill...weights an oz if that. If nothing else, these are great for supplement exercises...quick and easy. Wish I had found them earlier. Appear to be well made and durable, retain their original length so far. CHEAP...errr economical buy.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't broken
customer_reviews.text: The bands serve their purpose. However, they are slightly weaker (thinner bands) and a bit larger (which allows less resistance) in comparison to other brands on Amazon. What I do to create more resistance is put two bands ontop of each other until the resistance desired is reached. They haven't broken and I've had them for about 4 months so far. I'd definitely recommend if you need a moderate amount of resistance. However, if you use them frequently or need a lot of resistance I'd recommend checking out recommended bands by youtubers. I used a pair bought on amazon by a friend who bought it based on recommendations she saw online. Hers were around $10 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Weak and Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Two of the bands broke within 3 months of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: sapper

customer_reviews.title: He said he really like theses and likes that they have different sizes so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad who needs PT after a massive stroke. He said he really like theses and likes that they have different sizes so as his muscles strengthen he can keep moving up in size
customer_reviews.author: emjeter

customer_reviews.title: Durable bands
customer_reviews.text: I originally didn’t know which resistance level bands to get so I got the whole pack. They come with a convenient mesh bag to hold them in for days I want to take them to the gym. I haven’t used the heavy and extra heavy bands that much, I guess I’m not there yet but the other bands are great. I do all sorts of arm and leg exercises with them. The feeling and smell of them at first is a bit off-putting but it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying these!
customer_reviews.text: I got these bands to use as I travel to marathons. They are great for a quick strengthening workout (especially for lower body!) the days before a race, and I have started using them each morning as a quick way to get my muscles firing without tiring them out. I think they'll be critical to building my hip and knee strength going forward, and I'm very happy with how easily transportable they are! The color coding is helpful, as right now I am only using the two least resistive of the bands, but I expect as I grow stronger and experiment with other exercises I'll use the tougher ones. I highly recommend these bands!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sterrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel and when you cannot get to the gym
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great for getting in low to no-impact exercise. They are very easy to use and come in a convenient mesh bag. It's very easy to design or find a workout covering everything from rehab to HIIT. My only minor criticism is the durability. I have already snapped one of the black ones and that was within days of receiving it. The customer service I received was fantastic as I was promised a replacement right away. I'd recommend these for sure and will be looking to get the set that is a significantly higher tension as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Useful for exercises to mitigate lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The Resistance Bands were the the exact dimensions that I needed and usually custom made from rolls of Theraband. These came ready for use without any modifications on my part, very convenient and are sturdier than the loops that I custom made. I expect these to last a lot longer which was usually 2 - 3 months before breaking because they are made as one continuous loop. The ones I custom make usually break at the junction where I join the two discrete ends of the Theraband.
customer_reviews.author: Gen 3+

customer_reviews.title: Band snapped
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are pretty good, but my yellow band snapped! I wrote to the vendor asking for a replacement yellow band, they advised they would send me a whole new set. This was like a month ago, I've followed up and they stopped responding. Why even bother saying you're going to send new ones if you know you aren't....... I don't appreciate the dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Broke while  in use
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. They travel well. I was enjoying the challenge of moving up one notch of resistance, till I switched to black ( quite a feat for a little old lady). I was so proud! It broke on the first pull and I could have been injured. Now I need to buy a different set, and yet don't need the lower resistance levels.
customer_reviews.author: Katec

customer_reviews.title: you will feel these are way too easy. I have a blue one from another brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving 3 stars because it was not what I was looking for. I have been working out regularly and if you do the same, you will feel these are way too easy. I have a blue one from another brand and is tighter than the black from this brand. I think it is only worth it if you are just starting working out.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and good for workouts
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for over a year and they do exactly what I need them to do. I mostly use them for leg workouts and get a great burn from adding them into the movements. The only con so far is that one of the bands seems to have lost some of its tension (the strongest one), but I think it’s only because of extra use for the last 1.5 years. For that long of time, I think this is still a really good deal for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: For beginners
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used any other band besides the black Heavy band. The others are WAY too light. I'm not even sure what I'd use them for besides maybe something I'd attach them to and pull, like weighted leg extensions or overhead stretches. I use the heavy for all my glute activation and banded squats, etc. I haven't had them that long and it has already developed a small hole in it. I probably use it about 3-4 times a week and have only had it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Meisner

customer_reviews.title: The material is great, I personally love them as I use them ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you guys, I received the bands as expected, right on time for my next workout which I planned accordingly to the shipping date. The material is great, I personally love them as I use them regularly in my workouts.I highly recommend you guys purchasing your resistance bands right here and the price was great. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nunez Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a month still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for myself and family member, we have used them over a month now and they are still going strong. Because the bands are smaller, they can only stretch so far. I can personally feel the difference in resistance from band to band. They do roll when in use, but it still works fine. You can always stop and uncurl it. Haven't had an issue of the bands breaking. I definitely recommend them in addition to longer bands.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Equivalent to Band from PT
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set of resistance bands. My husband and I are both using them. I like how all the different levels of resistance are included in one pack. My husband has been suffering from severe lower back pain lately. His physical therapist gave him some exercises to do and sent him home with one band. Unfortunately, the one from the physical therapist broke, but the red one from this pack is very similar in strength. It has been several weeks so far of use and it is still holding up well. I am satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lewitt

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I got a factory second or was a return.
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the title I feel like this was a return or a factory second. The enclosed pictures show the state of the box as I received it. The edges looked as if they had been opened prior to it getting to me. Once opened the instructions were not folded on the preformed lines, it looked as if someone opened them and then just folded them back up to fit back in the box. The bands were new, each one was packaged in its own bag and showed no signes of use. We kept the bands due to the fact that the bands them selfs were brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bands primarily because they were the right price, but I was very happy to see that they are also great quality. Nicely packaged, detailed instructions (including an online resource for more information) and nice, stretchy, strong bands in a range of resistance levels. I have been using them for several weeks now and am very impressed - so much so that I purchased a yoga mat made by BalanceFrom because the quality of these bands gave me confidence that the mat would also be good quality - and I was right! Definitely recommend these bands, especially for someone just starting to exercise with resistance bands.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Virobik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comes in a cute and convenient carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I got these so that I could practice my Pilates exercises. I brought them to my lesson and my instructor went through all the ways I could use them. As a senior and a female I am very concerned about my hip joints. The exercises that we did are good for maintaining working and healthy hip joints. And since I do very long range flights I can take the loops on the flight and do the exercises on the airplane. Neat! I ordered sets for my two friends of same age and lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Glory

customer_reviews.title: First 3 resistance sizes broke soon after use
customer_reviews.text: The Extra Light, Light, and Medium bands tore and snapped apart with just a couple weeks of use. I wasn't using them with any equipment, just the floor and my feet or hands.
customer_reviews.author: Waldonator

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great company to work with! I was seeing results within days. One of the bands ripped. I contacted the company just to get that band replaced and they sent me a whole new set. It’s so hard to get real customer service anymore! I was very impressed! I cannot wait to see how my muscles will continue to tone and transform.
customer_reviews.author: KatyFitMom4

customer_reviews.title: Heavy band broke
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had these for almost 2 years. I don’t use them often. Today I was doing seated leg extensions and the band broke. So there’s that. 😫. Poor product quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable, versatile
customer_reviews.text: These are durable and have gotten hours of use through various workouts. I however never use the 2 lightest bands because they are like the resistance of air. I almost solely use the black for anything legs and the red for arms. The blue occasionally for some range of motion rehab type stuff. I was hoping for a little more resistance overall in the set, but I’m not mad.
customer_reviews.author: sarasara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received my bands quickly! They came with a small mesh bag makes carrying all of them easier. i throw them in my purse and go! i use mostly the heavy and extra heavy resistance bands to do leg/glute exercises while im at work! They are good condition and quality! Great buy for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Started a workout program that uses these. Although I don't need the light or xlight bands, they are great to have for new users. Allow progression and a smooth transition to other workouts. If you don't know how to use them, google or youtube for those exercises. They are very durable and I don't have to worry about them stretching out or breaking. Would recommend these for anyone looking at incorporating into their workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Samm D

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy resistant
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the heavy resistant bands (2x.3x,4x) and they aren’t very resistant. I’m 5’6 and weight 125lbs and just started working out again so I’m not that strong! They stretch out quickly and provide at the most a medium resistant. If you’re looking for heavy resistance, these won’t provide that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I workout quite regularly at CrossFit and you see so many different toys and contraptions it’s easy to get overwhelmed. You can really do a lot with these suckers. I’m always a little nervous that one of the lighter straps will snap but these suckers are pretty durable. I can’t really go into all the ways I use them they do have a guide that helps. But even if you have the slightest bit of knowledge of the body you can quickly adapt these straps to your routine.
customer_reviews.author: aimlesswander

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The first time my husband tried to use the black heavy band it snapped. When he contacted the seller about it they apologized profusely and immediately sent us an entire new set. Their customer service is excellent. The new bands all seem to be holding up well so we may have just gotten a bad one to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Weak tension
customer_reviews.text: The tension on the bands is overall weak. While there is increasing tension (from yellow to black), the increments are small and the bands are overall loose and specifically looser than what I have come to expect after using several such bands in gyms. I will need to buy another set (from a different manufacturer).
customer_reviews.author: Ido Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! They are a great value for the number of bands and the various resistances of each. They come with a mesh carry bag. This is the most portable exercise equipment you could imagine, easy to take anywhere. I take one or two whenever I travel. I use them daily. I try to get others to use them, especially people who are averse to exercise. Great product, great price, great quality, great portability.
customer_reviews.author: LMR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to use while working at a desk
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd purchase, first set was for me, 2nd for hubby, 3rd for 5 of my co-workers as New Year's gifts to start off the year with health goals; the bands are excellent to use while sitting and or standing in an office environment, the bands help with your range of motion as well as flexibility, not to mention if you are rehabbing an arm, leg, etc. They are sturdy and I love the small bag. No regrets in buying these, make great fitness gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty decent and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They came pretty fast and come in a lil box with a cute little net bag to put away. They look pretty decent and the more resistance bands look stronger and thicker than I've purchased before. I tried them out today with Charlene Extreme doing jumping jacks with them on , works pretty good . They dont role up on my legs like the previous ones I purchased did For the price you cant go wrong for 6 bands to keep or get fit
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: These have helped me so much with my physical limits
customer_reviews.text: I'm limited in the exercise I can do as I have permanent muscle damage in my back due to an accident years ago and I have R.A. and these limit what I can do physically but I stay determined to keep finding ways to work out and these have been amazing for me. I have gained strength in my legs and arms thanks to these bands. I feel better all the way around as the work outs with these bands have helped me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: t and the physical therapy used bands very much like these in my recovery process
customer_reviews.text: Had a recent partial knee replacemen,t and the physical therapy used bands very much like these in my recovery process. When I completed the formal PT program, my wife bought me a set of these Limm bands for me to continue the strengthening and mobility of the knee joint. This allowed me to cut out the co-pay and travel time to my PT class and do the equivalent exercises in the comfort of my own home. These bands are every bit as effective at the ones used by the PT professionals for the cost of one copay at their facility. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mold--retired Sr. Electrical Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Seem durable and great price
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Great price. Some odor but tolerable and function well for exercise which is more important.
customer_reviews.author: ddlovespilates

customer_reviews.title: Good but wears quickly
customer_reviews.text: Good and I like the options, but after less than six months of using the black band... It is my preferred band... Is showing signs of wear and there is a crack forming on one side that I feel is soon going to weaken it so much that I won't be able to use it. I don't want it to snap at the wrong moment and hit me in the face so I might have to go with another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Works good for price.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 47 year old women. I workout a lot and wanted to try the bands. They are worth the price. I can see them tearing if not carful. They are way to easy for my 15 year old son. They also roll on legs easy but I guess most of them do. If I like the band workout, I’d buy a better version. For now these work fine. Also, they don’t smell like plastic which I find a lot of these products do.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Banister-McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Regular gym go-ers: please read!
customer_reviews.text: I work out and weight lift very regularly. If you go to the gym and can sustain any form of weight, then odds are you will only use the black band. All the others bands are too light for me. I only use them for legs - they don’t work very effectively for arms or anything else in my opinion. But they are very durable and provide a great resistance leg workout!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Super soft maintaining resistance
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised with this product. Was worried it would be too touch on my skin but the bands are EXTREMELY soft while maintaining resistance. And I’m a traveler so the cute bag that fits ALL the bands is incredible convenient. **after a work our one of the bands broke. So only using the heavyweight ones**
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, wore out quickly
customer_reviews.text: These bands are way too thin to function correctly for physical therapy. The "heavy" red band is equivalent to the "light" green band in my PT's office. They are also cut too wide/long to begin with, so if you've got a smaller body, they're sometimes too large to be useful - you need constriction to provide resistance. Will not be purchasing again - spend the money to get proper bands.
customer_reviews.author: Liz H.

customer_reviews.title: I bought a second
customer_reviews.text: I liked these so much I bought a second. They make it easy to exercise at a desk. I am fairly strong and mainly use the red and black. The yellow, green, and blue are too light for me but perfect for my mother. The bands offer a good resistance range and can be added together to provide even more resistance. At no point am I afraid these will break on me. They seem very durable. Look for promotions Limm is offering. Sometimes you can get a discount or free item with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: The latex rips
customer_reviews.text: This happened to my face yesterday, while working out my arms the latex tore and I basically (with full force) punched myself in the face. The packaging does not state the product will rip with frequent use. If your looking for bands that will not rip then these are not what you want. I gave them 2 stars because if you dont use them often then they are great but who wants bands that they cant use everyday...
customer_reviews.author: RS01

customer_reviews.title: Snaps Easily
customer_reviews.text: Really like using these, and I can't really complain with the price being as reasonable as it is for useful equipment... The trouble is I have bought two sets in the last year and most of the bands have snapped from a couple weeks' use. I don't stretch them as far as they go or mess around with them, so it seems like others could have this problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: ¢a$h Money

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool for workouts on the go!
customer_reviews.text: These bands are small & self contained, perfect for office use! Nice storage bag (slightly larger than a cell phone) that fits in my work bag. The lighter bands are for true beginners. Happy that there are heavier bands for when I've outgrown this set. Already done some bicept curls at my desk, & will do some standing abductors on my next break! Nice little printed exercise selection!
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Daisy

product_meta.title: Limm Resistance Loop Bands - Resistance Exercise Bands for Home Fitness, Stretching, Strength Training, Physical Therapy, Natural Latex Workout Bands, Pilates Flexbands, 12" x 2"
feature_bullets: 【Your Very Own Personal Home Gym】 Bring new life, fun and excitement to your workouts with the "All-in-one, Ready-to-go, Take-them-anywhere, Gym-in-your-pocket" Limm Resistance Bands!

【Effective & Portable】 Get fit and sculpt a better body anywhere, without the need for expensive gym memberships, exercise equipment or even having to leave your home. The included carry bag makes it easy to take them with you wherever life takes you.

【Fun & Easy To Use】 Add fun to your workouts and use them, for example, while watching your favorite TV series. As each band has a different resistance, you can increase the intensity of your workout gradually, which makes them perfect for anyone.

【Outperform】 Each resistance band is made of professional grade 100% natural latex (TPE free), is odor free, elastic, durable and will stay flat even after excessive use. No more issues like pinching your skin, snapping, or leaving marks on your clothes.

【All You Need】 The included BONUS eBooks, instructions manual, online workout portal and growing online community (IG: BetterWorkouts), provide you with everything you need to succeed. Buy with confidence with our 100% Satisfaction & Lifetime guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
